Trade/Device Name(s): Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model GM550
Rightest GS550 Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model GM550 for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical detection.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm by healthcare professionals or diabetics at home to aid diabetes management; not for neonatal blood or diabetes diagnosis/screening.
